declarations.description: A web component that enables users to hide & show columns on an HTML table.
declarations.name: TableModifiableElement

events.name: table-modifiable:change
events.description: Fired when a column's visibility is toggled

attributes.name: removable
attributes.description: Comma-separated list of all column names that can be shown/hidden

attributes.name: start-with
attributes.description: Comma-separated list of which columns should be visible by default. If not specified, all removable columns will be shown initially

attributes.name: button-label
attributes.description: Text label for the toggle button (default: 'Modify Table')

attributes.name: button-aria-label
attributes.description: Accessible label for the toggle button. Use this to provide a more descriptive label for screen readers if needed (default: same as button-label)

attributes.name: tools-label
attributes.description: Heading text for the popover panel (default: 'Show/Hide Columns')

slots.description: Default slot for the table element

cssProperties.name: --table-modifiable-tool-bg
cssProperties.description: Background color for the modification tools popover

cssProperties.name: --table-modifiable-tool-color
cssProperties.description: Text color for the modification tools popover
